DOC.brief_summary: School-based intervention generally ineffective prevent weight gain child . In 2007 , group University British Columbia , develop program call Healthy Buddies , rely peer mentor help young child adopt healthy living behaviour . Pilot study reveal program effectively prevent weight gain child . This trial never test large scale use scientifically sound study design . We develop large school-based randomize trial overcome limitation test hypothesis school-based peer-led healthy living program would reduce adiposity increase physical activity among child 6-12yrs old .
